text: Ashes of Hope is a 1917 silent film western directed by Walter Edwards and starring Belle Bennett. It was produced and released by the Triangle Film Corporation.Ashes of Hope at silentera.com The AFI Catalog of Feature Films 1893-1993:Ashes of Hope ==Cast== *Belle Bennett - Gonda *Jack Livingston - Jim Gordon *Jack Richardson - 'Ace High' Lawton *Percy Challenger - Flat Foot *Josie Sedgwick - Belle ==Preservation status== *Incomplete print at the Library of Congress.The Library of Congress/FIAF American Silent Feature Film Survival Catalog:Ashes of Hope ==References== ==External links== *Ashes of Hope at IMDb.com * Category:1917 films Category:American films Category:American silent feature films Category:Triangle Film Corporation films Category:Films directed by Walter Edwards Category:American black-and- white films Category:American Western (genre) films Category:1917 Western (genre) films
title: Ashes of Hope
